item.title: Add a Button To Excel to Run a Macro
item.description: Adding Button for GUI Interface. Now that you have a few macros under your belt (some from scratch, some recorded, and some cut/pasted from the internet), itâ€™s time to make a user interface for them. In this tutorial, I will show you how to insert a simple button control to activate your macro. This is a very easy process and it will save you from having to explain to users how to get into the VBA editor.

item.title: Add a Button To Excel to Run a Macro
item.description: Adding Button for GUI Interface. Now that you have a few macros under your belt (some from scratch, some recorded, and some cut/pasted from the internet), it’s time to make a user interface for them. In this tutorial, I will show you how to insert a simple button control to activate your macro. This is a very easy process and it will save you from having to explain to users how to get into the VBA editor.
